General.Name: Sappi Ltd
General.Description: Sappi Limited provides materials made from woodfiber-based renewable resources in Europe, North America, and South Africa. The company offers dissolving pulp; graphic papers; packaging and specialty papers, including flexible packaging papers, label papers, functional paper packaging products, containerboards, paperboards, silicone base papers, dye sublimation papers, and inkjet papers; and casting and release papers. It also provides casting and release papers, biomaterials, and bio-energy, as well as forestry and pulp related products. Sappi Limited was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.
